casebody.data:
No. 10-1029. Robert Martinez, et al., Petitioners v. Regents of the University of California, et al. 563 U.S. 1032, 131 S. Ct. 2961,

180 L. Ed. 2d 245,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4299. June 6, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of California denied.

Same case below, 50 Cal. 4th 1277, 117 Cal. Rptr. 3d 359, 241 P.3d 855.
